title: battered haddock with mushy peas, sweet potato chips and tartare sauce
ingredients: 300ml/½ pint vegetable oil, for deep frying
½ Spanish onion, peeled, cut into rings
1 sprig fresh mint, leaves only, chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
300ml/½ pint vegetable oil, for deep frying
½ sweet potato, peeled, cut into chips
salt and freshly ground black pepper
